docs.text: when a film is produced on a shoestring budget by a couple of hardworking filmmakers and when it tells the story of a genuine tragedy , the easy path for a reviewer who hated the movie is to give it a pass .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: toss out your usual objectivity , ignore how many times you checked your watch while viewing it , forget how unbearable it was to sit through , and find some meaningless way to compliment it .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: this , of course , will be of no service to your readers , but at least you'll avoid the hate mail from the movie's fans .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: thus it is with a heavy heart that i review the movie paulina ( not to be confused with the recent movie paulie about a talking parrot ) .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: directed by vicky funari as a labor of intense love - she spent the last one third of her life on film - the movie blends documentary footage with historic and fanciful recreations to relate the bitterly sad and true story of paulina cruz suarez .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: paulina was a maid in vicky's household when vicky was young .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: i got to learn the film's background when i attended a screening in which the two women who made it were present .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: for those without such context , the reaction to the film may be that it is a parody of a bad indie film .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the acting is amateurish , the story is maudlin , and it has all the visual appeal of a bad home movie .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: grainy and overexposed , the movie , shot on 16mm film and videotape , has little to recommend it .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: confusingly composed , the movie jumps about jarringly as it tells its story .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: quite bloody at times , the story , full of horrific images , seems designed to shock and repulse us .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: why else would you include a scene with a completely nude and bloody 8-year-old paulina ?
docs.label: negative

docs.text: another scene has a teenage paulina being fondled on a bus by the man sitting next to her .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: in retaliation , she bites off part of his finger .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: this covers the both of them in a bucket of blood .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the passengers on the bus then view the girl in their minds as everything from saint to sinner .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: one , for example , sees her as an aztec priestess holding out a large heart that she had just cut from a body .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the lugubrious tale has paulina being raped and beaten .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: certainly she had to endure a miserable life .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: but that does not guarantee that a movie about her will necessarily being good .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: i felt trapped in the theater watching it .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: only the opportunity to talk with the filmmakers afterwards made the movie bearable .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: paulina runs 1 : 28 .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the film is in spanish with english subtitles .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it is not rated but would be an r for violence and nudity and would be acceptable for older teenagers .
docs.label: negative
